description: This file is a Python source code module responsible for generating JSON-RPC API headers, enums, classes, and stubs based on schemas. It automates code creation for JSON-RPC interfaces, including optional class and stub generation, and manages file up-to-dateness.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file defining the JSON-RPC API based on a list of headers, including necessary include directives and comments.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that processes a JSON schema to generate C++ header files, enum files, version info, stubs, and RPC implementations based on provided options and schema content.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
